actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Civil Rights Act of 1964 and the act commonly called the Civil Rights Act of 1968 to prevent discrimination in employment and housing against disabled persons.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Prohibits, under the Civil Rights Act of 1964 and the Civil Rights Act of 1968, discrimination in employment and housing against disabled persons.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Civil Rights Act of 1964 and the act commonly called the Civil Rights Act of 1968 to prevent discrimination in employment and housing against disabled persons.
